ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Attack speedups
ygData.msgSnippet: John-- Interesting numbers.  Did you do the timings on your lvl 50 bard singing the songs on himself and then the enchanter casting spells on himself? What was
ygData.messageBody:
John--

Interesting numbers. Did you do the timings on your lvl 50 bard singing
the songs on himself and then the enchanter casting spells on himself?
What was the original weapon delay? Not that these numbers aren't grossly
apparent, but if you did use the songs/spells on different characters, how
did you control for intrinsic differences? Also, I take it these numbers
were from combat?

I guess I'm just asking how you did the experiment :) Frankly, I'm not
convinced that controlling for any of these things would make a
significant change in the numbers you obtained.

Given all that, I suppose the question is: should I be nauseated? I
wonder if higher level enchanter buffs are even more superior to the lvl
16 buff.

Sinistral of Karana

On Wed, 29 Mar 2000 kim@... wrote:

> I did some timings with my L18 enchanter and his level 12 Quickness
spell while Karana was down last night:<

Time Swings Delay %chg Delay %chg Speed
> Normal 177.7 50 35.54 - -
> Warsong(50) 285.8 100 28.58 -19.58% 24.35%
> Anthem 162.5 50 32.50 -8.55% 9.35%
> Celerity 147.8 50 29.56 -16.83% 20.23%
> Beserk(50) 148.1 49 30.22 -14.96% 17.59%
> Verses 136.9 50 27.38 -22.96% 29.80%
>
> Quick(18) 51.9 19 27.32 -23.14% 30.11%
> 27.3 10 27.30 -23.19% 30.18%
